parameters.query:
WITH in_params AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF('{{ $json.post_url.replace(/'/g,"''") }}','')               AS full_url,
    NULLIF('{{ $json.post_content?.replace(/'/g,"''") }}','')          AS post_content,
    NULLIF('{{ $json.page_url?.replace(/'/g,"''") }}','')              AS page_url,
    /* If your column is timestamptz, keep as ::timestamptz.
       If it's timestamp (without tz), use AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' to drop tz. */
    (
      CASE
        WHEN '{{ $json.posted_at }}' = '' THEN NULL
        ELSE '{{ $json.posted_at }}'::timestamptz
      END
    )                                                                  AS posted_at,
    NULLIF('{{ $("Normalize").first().json?.auth_user_id }}','')::uuid AS auth_user_id
),
-- Upsert page if present; page_name is not known here, keep NULL
upsert_page AS (
  INSERT INTO pages (page_url, page_name)
  SELECT p.page_url, NULL
  FROM in_params p
  WHERE p.page_url IS NOT NULL
  ON CONFLICT (page_url) DO UPDATE
    SET page_name = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.page_name, pages.page_name)
  RETURNING id, page_url
),
-- Insert/Upsert post; attach page_id if we have one; update fields if provided
inserted_post AS (
  INSERT INTO public.posts (page_id, full_url, content, posted_at)
  SELECT
    (SELECT id FROM upsert_page),  -- NULL if no page_url
    p.full_url,
    p.post_content,
    /* If posts.posted_at is timestamp (without tz), use:
       (p.posted_at AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') instead of p.posted_at */
    p.posted_at
  FROM in_params p
  WHERE p.full_url IS NOT NULL
  ON CONFLICT (full_url) DO UPDATE
    SET
      page_id   = COALESCE((SELECT id FROM upsert_page), posts.page_id),
      content   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.content, posts.content),
      posted_at = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.posted_at, posts.posted_at)
  RETURNING id, page_id, full_url, content, posted_at
),
-- Optional: grant user access if provided; ignore duplicates
granted_access AS (
  INSERT INTO user_post_access (auth_user_id, post_id, granted_at, granted_by)
  SELECT 
    p.auth_user_id,
    ip.id,
    NOW(),
    p.auth_user_id
  FROM in_params p
  JOIN inserted_post ip ON TRUE
  WHERE p.auth_user_id IS NOT NULL
  ON CONFLICT (auth_user_id, post_id) DO NOTHING
)
SELECT * FROM inserted_post;

INSERT INTO public.users (fb_profile_id, full_name)
VALUES (
  $$ {{ $json.user_profile_id }} $$,
  NULLIF(btrim($$ {{ $json.user_full_name || "" }} $$), '')
)
ON CONFLICT (fb_profile_id) DO UPDATE
SET full_name = EXCLUDED.full_name
RETURNING id, fb_profile_id, full_name;
SELECT MAX(inserted_at) AS inserted_at FROM posts WHERE full_url = '{{ $json.post_url.replace(/'/g,"''") }}';

parameters.responseBody:

  "message": "post already present; proceeding to comments freshness",
  "request_id": "={{$json.request_id}}",
  "access_granted": true,
  "granted_to_user": "={{ $('Normalize').item.json.auth_user_id }}"
}

parameters.query:
SELECT MAX(p.inserted_at) AS inserted_at
FROM posts p
JOIN pages g ON g.id = p.page_id
WHERE g.page_url = '{{ $json.page_url.replace(/'/g, "''") }}';

nodes.name: Extract Post Id And Content For Sentiment Analysis

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO public.comments (full_url, post_id, user_id, content, posted_at)
VALUES (
  NULLIF('{{ $json.comment_url.replace(/'/g,"''") }}',''),
  '{{ $json.post_id.trim() }}'::uuid,
  NULLIF('{{ ($json.user_id || "").trim() }}','')::uuid,
  /* NULL if blank; otherwise preserve emojis/newlines verbatim */
  NULLIF($n8n$ {{ $json.comment_content || "" }} $n8n$, $n8n$$n8n$),
  NULLIF('{{ $json.posted_at || "" }}','')::timestamptz
)
ON CONFLICT (full_url) DO UPDATE
SET
  post_id   = EXCLUDED.post_id,
  user_id   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.user_id, comments.user_id),
  content   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.content, comments.content),
  posted_at = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.posted_at, comments.posted_at)
RETURNING
  id,
  full_url,
  post_id,
  user_id,
  content,
  (SELECT p.content FROM public.posts p WHERE p.id = comments.post_id) AS post_content;

nodes.name: Group Comments With Postgres Post Ids
Extract Post/Comment Id And Content For Sentiment Analysis

parameters.query:
WITH incoming(comment_id, comment_content) AS (
  VALUES
  {{
    $items().map(i => "(" +
      "'" + i.json.comment_id + "'::uuid, " +
      (i.json.comment_content
        ? "'" + i.json.comment_content.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'"
        : "NULL"
      ) +
    ")").join(",\n")
  }}
)
SELECT
  c.id AS comment_id,
  COALESCE(c.content, incoming.comment_content) AS comment_content
FROM incoming
JOIN comments c
  ON c.id = incoming.comment_id
LEFT JOIN sentiments s
  ON s.comment_id = c.id
WHERE s.comment_id IS NULL                 -- keep only comments with no sentiment yet
ORDER BY c.inserted_at ASC NULLS LAST, c.id ASC;

nodes.name: Get All Comments From Ids Without Sentiment

parameters.query:
WITH incoming(post_id, post_content) AS (
  VALUES
  {{ 
    $items().map(i => "(" +
      "'" + i.json.post_id + "'::uuid, " +
      (i.json.post_content
        ? "'" + i.json.post_content.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'"
        : "NULL"
      ) +
    ")").join(",\n")
  }}
)
SELECT
  p.id          AS post_id,
  COALESCE(p.content, incoming.post_content) AS post_content
FROM incoming
JOIN posts p
  ON p.id = incoming.post_id
LEFT JOIN sentiments s
  ON s.post_id = p.id
 AND s.comment_id IS NULL
WHERE s.post_id IS NULL          -- keep only posts with no post-level sentiment yet
ORDER BY p.inserted_at ASC NULLS LAST, p.id ASC;
